data.what_is:
Xtremepush is the most complete CRM solution on the market that enables iGaming companies to leverage real-time data, AI, and gamification to build, grow, and retain strong player relationships that drive conversion and loyalty through lifecycle-specific journeys at scale. All in one unified solution.
 
Based in Dublin, with additional offices in London and New York, our company is dedicated to assisting operators worldwide in gaining a comprehensive understanding of their player base, enhancing player experiences, and increasing retention.
data.product_description: Xtremepush is an Omnichannel Customer Engagement Platform powered by a built-in CDP. It enables companies to understand their customers and transform ordinary customer experiences into engaging interactions that drive conversion, retention, and revenue across all channels.Xtremepush offers the widest breadth of channels available in an omnichannel platform, with an unrivalled depth of features and functionality across each of them.Unlike most of our competitors, we own all of our technology. This means we can guarantee superior service and performance, and you never need to deal with a third-party provider.We are more than technology vendors, we are strategic partners, working closely with our clients to help them achieve their KPIs and enhance their customer engagement.We deliver genuinely world-class after-sales service, with a global team of dedicated onboarding specialists, account managers and technical support professionals on-hand to offer strategic guidance and day-to-day advice.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
That data collection can be obtained in real-time, allowing for personalisation of communications, helps in building segments/audiences, and keeps data, including subscription data (which we previously had to look up & import manually with our previous CRM provider) up to date in real-time. Building campaigns is very easy.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
- Reporting: some insights are tough to report on e.g. button clicks & closes for onsite pop ups/alerts. The analysis provides a breakdown of all sends and clicks but at a generic level. Also, does not segment by customer in analysis of campaign comparison so we cannot exclude test users from this data. Use case has been raised to our AM.

The only other bits I dislike about the platform are technical related but are reoccurring/ongoing issues:

- Caching issues: adding a new site often has caching issues which has produced issues with web push being offered when turned off. Temporary fixes have been suggested and applied.
- User project permissions: Have been unable to assign users to specific projects since onboarding. Have to raise requests to support to action.
- Applying onsite templates: have had issues when the applied template for a campaign (onsite only) has not overridden the previous content correctly. Requires manual intervention and correction via the source code to meet the requirements.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Hopefully reporting and analytics, which will help us dive into reporting on the effectiveness of campaigns better without having to carry out additional manual work.

- Customer Support is very quick to respond and is always extremely helpful. The XP team as a whole are very accomodating. There hasn't been an issue yet where we didn't find a solution or a suitable work around.
-  Allows us to send more personalised comms to our members across email, SMS, push notifications via web/app.
- Journey builder is excellent. Very easy to segement our members so we can send the right message to the right members at the right time. We can add reactive messaging into this journey also which is very helpful i.e. if a member doesn't open an email, we can react by sending them an SMS etc.
- Allows us to contact large volumes of members quickly and easily which is particularly important for time critical messaging. With our old platform we had to wait days for lists to be compiled and validated. Now we can pull our own lists directly from the platform to send within a matter of minutes.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
Any dislikes are minor in comparison to the benefits this platform has afforded us.

-Would be great to have separate folders for different departments across the business instead of one long list of any and all campaigns, drafts etc. The labels help with this somewhat but folders would be ideal.
- More analysis on SMS campaigns. At present, we can only see total number delivered and bounces. Click through rate on any links is not visible.
- When creating a template you have to save inside the 'edit template' mode and then again once outside the template, otherwise work is lost. We have gotten used to this now but could be more easy to save.
- In the multi-channel journey builder, if we want to change the time in a wait step so that the member gets the email earlier or later than we planned originally, members who are already in the journey will receive the email as per the old time we had in place even if they haven't yet reached that step in the journey. Only new members who enter the journey after the change has been made will get the email within the new timeframe we have chosen.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
One stop shop for all our campaigns and analytics. We used to have a platfrom solely for emails and a separate platform for SMS. We can now send emails, SMS, push notifications all from the one place and the cherry on top, we can include them all as part of the one campaign in the journey builder if we want. This centralised comms tool has allowed us to become more efficient and ensures that all our comms are following consistent brand guidelines.

We now have a single view of the customer. We can create personalised, data-driven customer experiences. We can identify the most effective comms channel, improve tactical campaign measurement. As a result of the capabilities on Xtremepush around AB testing, advanced segmentation and personalisation, we have seen a significant boost in engagement, compared to our campaigns pre Xtremepsuh.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Digital Marketing and conversion tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
It's been two years, 8 months since we started using Xtremepush, and our main focus has been App and Web push notifications. The experience has been amazing because the interface is user-friendly and the dashboard is easy to use. The fact that once a customer has opted in they are able to receive our messages every time we send out new campaigns it's just amazing.

It also gives you the analytics of all the campaigns, therefore we are able to tailor-make our campaign according to the results and adjust where need be. The conversion rate of every campaign is well shown in the analytics tabs and this guides the decision-making of any campaign.

The Xtremepush support team has also been helpful and very prompt if we have a situation. They are always ready to assist when need be.

During the Pandemic period, they took advantage and organized Webinars and training and they were willing and ready to answer every question which was really helpful and insightful.

To summarize we are happy with the tool and we plan to explore more, from website tagging and in App messaging.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
I don't think there's anything I dislike about this tool, because all the updates done on the tool are beneficial and they always give heads up before any update is done.

Recommendations to others considering Xtremepush:
I will definitely recommend this tool to other companies/friends as long as they have their objectives on what or why they want to use the tool.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since I work in a gambling company and it's always sports season, this tool helps us in sending messages on all apps both Android and iOS, and web notifications to our customers to update them on the games being played. Whenever we have promotions and updates from our end is an easy tool to reach a big pool of customers. We are also able to set different campaigns and use the A/B testing to test which campaigns or projects are working.

all_reviews.review_title: Super tool for digital marketing and exceptional customer support!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
We have been using Xtreme Push for 3 years, primarily for email marketing but also some SMS and web push/pop-ups as well. It is a great tool with a very easy to use interface. It is simple to create templates and very quick to execute campaigns. Instant analytics are then available to view after sending campaigns. When we first engaged with XP, we were up and running in a very short period of time and were sending campaigns out within 6 weeks which was phenomenal turnaround time to get a new tool implemented and working. We had first class engagement from the very start with access to CEO, CTO and account manager on a regular basis. They are always available for a call if there any issues or you need any advice on the tool itself or trying to launch new marketing initiatives.  They helped us with training courses/documentation and guided us on best practices that other clients use which really helped to embed the tool with end users. They go the extra mile to know our business well which really helps as they understand the customer journey and how they interact with the website and our many products. They are always proactive with ideas and when we engage in projects or change requests, they have a strong team who deliver quickly. Customer support is always on hand when required and respond to queries quickly.

During the pandemic, when external communications ramped down, we started to use the XP platform for internal communications by using APIs to integrate with Microsoft Outlook to synch email addresses and email distribtion lists. This has really helped us to be more efficient communicating important messages to staff for things like roster changes, training and compliance courses, weekly comms, personalised messages, covid return to work protocols, etc. In the past, we would have had to send physical letters, generic emails, multiple emails to different employees, multiple phone calls. However,  with XP, we were able to send one campaign to 100s of employees using dynamic variables to communicate personal details to each employee. We were able to track engagement levels across different departments which is great to get instant feedback to know employees are receiving important messages. We supplemented this with SMS to tell employees to check company email for important notices. For front line staff, this has changed the game for how we communicate to them.

Overall, we are delighted using the XP platform and I have no hesitation in recommending them to other companies to use., You won't be disappointed!

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
There is nothing I dislike about the tool. They have regular SaaS updates, which are constantly adding new features and fixing any bugs. If we have change requests, these would be released on a regular basis as part of these upgrades. If we have any issues, they are always quick to respond, and the phone line is always open, even outside core hours, from CEO down to make sure any problems are resolved quickly.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a robust process in place now with XP to manage permissions across our business, and XP is an excellent tool for communicating with customers. We are able to set up different projects on the platform for different business units and can control access to these easily on the platform.
As described above, the internal comms through XP has been excellent and not something we ever thought we would use the platform for, but it has been a game-changer using dynamic variables to send one email to 100s of employees with personalized content.

all_reviews.review_title: Reliable platform for re-engaging your customers. Outstanding support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
Xtremepush proved to be a great addition to our MarTech stack from the get-go. The 100% uptime experience, the simple yet intuitive UI, and the excellent service are reasons why Xtremepush has been our partner of choice for over three years (since early 2019).
It's an empowering tool, giving our marketers the much-needed self-sufficiency for setting up and managing multiple projects from a unified UI while connecting various marketing channels to a single push pipeline.
Their API enabled a convenient integration with other platforms we use, and their powerful analytics made it easy for us to track the channel functionality on all levels.
Their API documentation is straightforward, the SDK setup is easy, they offer detailed product documentation with guides and best practices to get you started, but what truly makes a difference is their responsiveness. Their support service is super prompt and professional. Furthermore, our dedicated Customer Success Manager always made us feel we are a valued customer.
I highly recommend Xtremepush - it's easy to deploy and get started, it's a dependable and powerful platform.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
Since we integrated their service with a 3rd party automation hub, we can't use all the features available in Xtremepush UI. Advanced analytics, TTL on a message level or web inbox messaging (available under the same SDK) are things we are missing.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Although we use their service primarily for push messaging, Xtremepush was a game-changer for our marketing strategy, allowing us to re-engage customers in a personalized, timely, and meaningful way. With messages delivered quickly and reliably, we increased the number of returning customers, boosting our retention rates.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
Very attentive customer service, our account manager in Xtremepush is always on hand to provide support and to keep us in the loop with new integrations. Support desk is very responsive and happy to have calls to go through any aspect of the platform whether it's setting up a new campaign, looking at how we can utilise analytics or setting up a test group. Especially with the number of users within our company, they are on hand to support the numerous staff we have signed up on the platform. There is a quarterly call to go through various projects where strategy and analytics are reviewed and recommendations are provided. Excellent communication and availability. Also able to adapt to the changing needs of our organisation.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
One aspect of the platform we would like to improve would be the analytics section, it would be great to have a holistic view of all analytics (per project) on one screen and how various statistics are interlinked - for example, how do sessions relate to tags and events? I understand we have to create our own funnels in funnel analysis but it would be useful if the platform were to advise on optimal user journeys without us having to manually do it. Google analytics has a very user friendly interface where some aspects could be integrated into Xtremepush.

Recommendations to others considering Xtremepush:
A brilliant platform with very helpful and attentive staff behind it.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xtremepush has the expertise to advise on effective campaigns. They helped our organisation improve one of our app ratings in the app stores through a cleverly segmented campaign. They help us communicate with customers regarding important updates and possible issues with apps. They help us to segment our campaigns, so we communicate with customers effectively, not sending repetitive messages that don't apply to them. We look at how customers use the app, and Xtremepush advise on what messaging we could send to these users to assist them with their user journey and this helps to promote usage of the app.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
The ability to build segmented audiences through deploying tags is brilliant. That way we can target purposeful messages to relevant audiences.

It allows marketers to think outside the box and maximise the reach of content and offers. It is also great asset we can sell in commercial campaigns.

Once tags are deployed it is a relatively easy system to use for marketers and has become a part of my day.

The account and support team are very quick with responses and always willing to help.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
There is so much we can do with it that it can be a worry that you don't send too many messages out to your audience at the same time. Overall very happy with the service.

Recommendations to others considering Xtremepush:
I would recommend Xtremempush so you can maximise your content, create segmented audiences and report on campaign results to inform strategies.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem I am solving is maximising content and increasing brand awareness to our audiences. Our content has become more purposeful to our audiences as we are able to segment the audiences and messaging.

I also able to use the analytics to report on the audiences to higher management and editorial teams to inform strategies.

all_reviews.review_title: An excellent addition to any companys tools.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
XtremePush allows for seamless integration of multiple marketing channels through one, unified platform.

It provides your marketing team with tools and processes to target and communicate with your users on the platform they would prefer. These tools, in turn, allow for a happy, more content userbase with a higher engagement rate.

By basing your companies marketing and communication processes around XtremePush customer journey mapping, you can ensure complete control while maintaining an almost entirely autonomous system.

If you run into any issues or queries, their top-class customer service and technical support team are always happy to assist.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
There's little to dislike about the product. Anything that you do find is normally resolved within a future update or with the help of their dedicated support team.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
Currently, we use XtremePush to target users based on data we feed to their platform. XtremePush allows us to target these users at specific times, places and on particular devices. It's beneficial for getting a message to a user at the right time and place to maximise return.

all_reviews.review_title: A brilliant mix of power and simplicity that rivals the biggest of enterprise solutions...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xtremepush?
Ease of use, even when deploying complex campaigns. The first class UX and extremely responsive and helpful end user support. The easy and elegant way of capturing and working with data for segmentation and personalisation. The feeling that their platform development roadmap is based on actual user feedback and input.

What do you dislike about Xtremepush?
There is genuinely noting that I dislike about the XtremePush platform.

Recommendations to others considering Xtremepush:
Keep XtremePush in mind when looking for a mutli-channel digital marketing solution. They may not be as well known as some of the enterprise solutions at the moment, but as someone who has worked with the majority of them, I can not see a world where I would choose one over XtremePush in the future. Their customer service is flawless and their product development over the last year has been phenomenal. I am the owner of this tool for end users working both globally and across 4 brands and they all love it. The ease of use does not come at the expense of functionality and we've been able to achieve integrations that I would not have thought possible in the past.

What problems is Xtremepush solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using XtremePush as our multi-channel CRM solution for all of the brands in our group. We use them to deploy campaigns and automations that have helped us drive a better customer retention and a higher LTV, as well as a much increased conversion rate for several of our KPIs. We also use XtremePush's data to help us with customer profile matching and general analytics.

And that's the case with xtremepush as well, whenever you need help or advice guys from xtremepush will be there for you, from the kick-off to stage of the full usage of the product.

All in one concept is not new for the world of the CRM systems and in case of xtremepush, everything works seamlessly allowing you to focus on your goals and tasks.
